mapper.insert: insert into fnd_func(func_id,func_name,func_type,func_pid,valid,func_desc,func_icon,func_url,order,target) values (SELECT (MAX(func_id) +1)as id from fnd_func,'${func_name}','${func_type}', NULL '${func_pid}', NULL '${valid}', NULL '${func_desc}', '${func_icon}','${func_url}','${order}','${target}' )
mapper.update: update fnd_func set func_name='${func_name}',func_type='${func_type}', func_pid='${func_pid}', valid= NULL '${valid}' ,func_desc= NULL '${func_desc}' ,func_icon= NULL '${func_icon}' ,func_url= NULL '${func_url}' ,order= NULL '${order}', target= NULL '${target}' where func_id=#{func_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT u.* FROM fnd_func u where u.func_id = #{func_id}
SELECT u.* FROM fnd_func u where u.func_pid = #{func_pid}

SELECT u.* FROM fnd_func u where 1=1
and u.func_name like '%${func_name}%'
